briefTitle: A Randomized Controlled Study of Postoperative Adjuvant Therapy of Uracil-tegafur (UFT) Compared With Cyclophosphamide/Methotrexate/5-fluorouracil (CMF) in Breast Cancer (NSAS-BC)
officialTitle: A Randomized Controlled Study of Postoperative Adjuvant Therapy of UFT Compared With CMF in High-risk Women With Axillary Node-negative Breast Cancer (NSAS-BC)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 18 to 75
* Performance status 0 or 1 (ECOG)
* Hematopoietic WBC ≥ 4,000/mm\^3 Platelet ≥ 100,000/mm\^3
* Hepatic AST and ALT ≤ 2.5 times upper limit of normal(ULN) Total bilirubin ≤ ULN
* Renal Creatinine ≤ ULN

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior anticancer treatment
